welcome_message_body: Welcome to Geisenheim, Germany! Known for its picturesque vineyards, charming architecture, and rich history, we invite you to explore and savor all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Mainz Finthen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Air Base Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern terminal with a wide range of shops, restaurants, and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Currently under construction, Terminal 3 will be the newest addition to Frankfurt International Airport and will primarily serve Lufthansa flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also offered for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
